channel.title: Nulled
channel.description:
mmk everytime i try to login to my server i got this: [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2igm7n8.jpg[/img] [code]Connecting to SQL server... Starting Server On Port: 43594 Client connected from 127.0.0.1 test Has Logged In Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Client connected from 127.0.0.1 test Has Logged In Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] P.S. - The name DOES show i just edited it out for no reason :D
[code]Connecting to SQL server... Starting Server On Port: 43594 Client connected from 127.0.0.1 test Has Logged In Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.method(stream.java:194) at client.method(client.java:6276) at client.method(client.java:365) at client.run(client.java:179) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Client connected from 127.0.0.1 test Has Logged In Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.method(stream.java:194) at client.method(client.java:6276) at client.method(client.java:365) at client.run(client.java:179) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] Replaced methods with "method" just so you know thats not why... And i'm almost 100% sure that this has nothing to do with why i'm being nulled because i commented out two lines to get it :D

item.title: Nulled
item.dc:creator: @Zhaedara Zhaedara
item.description:
@Zhaedara wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:12, topic:244981”][quote]
public class NullPointerException
extends RuntimeException

Thrown when an application attempts to use null in a case where an object is required. These include:

* Calling the instance method of a null object.
* Accessing or modifying the field of a null object.
* Taking the length of null as if it were an array.
* Accessing or modifying the slots of null as if it were an array.
* Throwing null as if it were a Throwable value.

Applications should throw instances of this class to indicate other illegal uses of the null object.

Since:
JDK1.0
See Also:
Serialized Form
[/quote]

We aren’t going to be able to help if you wont tell us what Class or Line number it’s on.[/quote]
ok then give me a second

Read full topic

item.title: Nulled
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

public class NullPointerException extends RuntimeException

Thrown when an application attempts to use null in a case where an object is required. These include:

* Calling the instance method of a null object.
* Accessing or modifying the field of a null object.
* Taking the length of null as if it were an array.
* Accessing or modifying the slots of null as if it were an array.
* Throwing null as if it were a Throwable value.

Applications should throw instances of this class to indicate other illegal uses of the null object.

Since:
JDK1.0
See Also:
Serialized Form

We aren’t going to be able to help if you wont tell us what Class or Line number it’s on.

Read full topic

Connecting to SQL server... Starting Server On Port: 43594 Client connected from 127.0.0.1 test Has Logged In Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Client connected from 127.0.0.1 test Has Logged In Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at GOOBER! at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
